hanzi-su-wiki:
築

Значения

Строить, сооружать, воздвигать

Мнемоника

Забивать деревянным 木 пестом бамбуковые 竹 сваи, уплотнять грунт, строить.

Варианты

筑
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhù
to build; to construct; to ram; to hit; Taiwan pr. [zhu2]
строить; строить; таранить; ударить; Тайвань пр. [zhu2]

heisig_chinese_memo: Bamboo crafting is an ordinary substitute for wood when you are working or trying to construct a house.
heisig_constituent: fabricate, bamboo, barge, craft, mediocre, wind, drop, tree, wood
koohiiStory1: Bamboo crafting is a mediocre substitute for wood when you are building or fabricating a house. While it may look good and might attract a chick (ちく) or two, the kids´ll (きず) just tear it to pieces as its not sturdy enough.
koohiiStory2: A bamboo fabrication is a mediocre substitute for wood.
jp_example_words:
築く(きずく): to build, to pile up, to amass
新築(しんちく): new building, new construction
建築(けんちく): construction, architecture
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You saw down a bamboo tree to construct and build a building. Bamboo trees are great for construction, so you saw down a bunch of bamboo trees to build this new building.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine yourself sawing down this bamboo tree. Feel the saw in your hands as you slide through the bamboo, wood chips flying everywhere.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you construct and build this building, you hear a strange cheeping noise. Suddenly a chick (ちく) pops out of one of the bamboo pieces you are building with. Then another, and another. You're surrounded by chicks!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine trying to construct the rest of this building covered in baby chicks. They're very cute, but this is dangerous! You have to build very carefully, so you don't accidentally hurt any of them.
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), 几 (стол), 工 (техника), 木 (дерево), 竹 (бамбук)
Ru_trainchinese:
zhù: (глаг) строить (напр., здание)
zhù: (графема) древний инструмент с тремя струнами, на котором играли с помощью бамбуковой палочки
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the zither (筑) in the tree (木) is constructed
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I can't work with this ancient harp! It was such an ordinary construct (built poorly)! The bamboo is hard and stiff! Give me a new koto any day of the week.
humanum_full_description_en:
The original meaning of " Zhu " is a pestle for pounding soil, "Shuowen": "To build, pound also. From wood, build sound. 𥲔, ancient Chinese.". "Zuo Zhuan. "Xuangong Eleventh Year": "It is called "Fanzhu", "Cheng Tuwu." Kong Yingdashu: "The duster, the vessel for holding the earth; the builder, the pestle for building the earth." Means to make the earth moving and building earth commensurate , Calculate the ratio of earthwork (measurement unit of soil, which refers to one cubic meter of soil) to timber.

" Building " inscriptions as " built " from the " Bamboo " from " 𢀜 ", " bamboo " is a sound character. "Said Wen": "Building, using bamboo to tune the five-string music. From bamboo to 𢀜. 𢀜, to hold it. Bamboo also sounds."

Inscriptions on architecture, Zihezi cauldron: "Guardians build (build) poles", Guo Moruo explained: "Guardians are like cheating, either build poles in the cauldron to reduce the amount, or add things outside the cauldron to benefit it. The amount should be stopped.” (Refer to General Explanation of Form and Meaning in Inscription)
humanum_short_description_en: " Zu " starts from " wood ", and the sound of " Build " is the original meaning of a pestle used to pound the soil.
humanum_full_description:
「築」的本義是搗土用的杵，《說文》：「築，擣也。从木，筑聲。𥲔，古文。」。《左傳．宣公十一年》：「稱畚築，程土物。」孔穎達疏：「畚者，盛土之器；築者，築土之杵。」意謂使運土功程與築土功程相稱，計算土方（土的計量單位，指一立方米泥土）和材木的比例。

　　「築」金文作「筑」，從「竹」從「𢀜」，「竹」是聲符。《說文》：「筑，以竹曲五弦之樂也。从竹从𢀜。𢀜，持之也。竹亦聲。」

　　金文表示建築，子禾子釜：「關人筑(築)桿」，郭沫若釋云：「關吏如舞弊，或于釜內築桿以減少其量，或于釜外加物以添益其量，則當制止之。」(參金文形義通解)
humanum_short_description: 「築」從「木」，「筑」聲，本義是舂搗泥土用的杵。

①搗土的杵：“項王伐齊，身負板築，以爲士卒先”。
②建造，修蓋：修築。建築。構築。
③居室：“畏人成小築，褊性合幽棲”。
④古代絃樂器，形似琴，有十三絃。演奏時，左手按弦的一端，右手執竹尺擊弦發音。
⑤建修。

新築(しんちく): new building, new construction
建築(けんちく): construction, architecture

「 築 」的本義是搗土用的杵，《說文》：「築，擣也。从木，筑聲。𥲔，古文。」。《左傳．宣公十一年》：「稱畚築，程土物。」孔穎達疏：「畚者，盛土之器；築者，築土之杵。」意謂使運土功程與築土功程相稱，計算土方（土的計量單位，指一立方米泥土）和材木的比例。 「 築 」金文作「 筑 」，從「 竹 」從「 𢀜 」，「 竹 」是聲符。《說文》：「筑，以竹曲五弦之樂也。从竹从𢀜。𢀜，持之也。竹亦聲。」 金文表示建築，子禾子釜：「關人筑(築)桿」，郭沫若釋云：「關吏如舞弊，或于釜內築桿以減少其量，或于釜外加物以添益其量，則當制止之。」(參金文形義通解)
The original meaning of " Zhu" is a pestle for pounding soil, "Shuowen": "To build, pound also. From wood, build sound. 𥲔, ancient Chinese.". "Zuo Zhuan. "Xuangong Eleventh Year": "It is called "Fanzhu", "Cheng Tuwu." Kong Yingdashu: "The duster, the vessel for holding the earth; the builder, the pestle for building the earth." Means to make the earth moving and building earth commensurate , Calculate the ratio of earthwork (measurement unit of soil, which refers to one cubic meter of soil) to timber. " Building" inscriptions as " built" from the " Bamboo" from " 𢀜", " bamboo" is a sound character. "Said Wen": "Building, using bamboo to tune the five-string music. From bamboo to 𢀜. 𢀜, to hold it. Bamboo also sounds." Inscriptions on architecture, Zihezi cauldron: "Guardians build (build) poles", Guo Moruo explained: "Guardians are like cheating, either build poles in the cauldron to reduce the amount, or add things outside the cauldron to benefit it. The amount should be stopped.” (Refer to General Explanation of Form and Meaning in Inscription)

築字的基本解释

築
zhù

築
zhú
均见“筑”。

築字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhù］
［《廣韻》張六切，入屋，知。］
“筑2”的繁体字。
(1)捣土的杵。
(2)捣土使坚实。
(3)修建，建造。
(4)居室；建筑物。
(5)打，击。
(6)填塞；装填。
(7)拾取。
(8)量名。
(9)通“祝”。切断。
(10)通“妯”。参见“築娌”。

築字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　築； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页892第18
【廣韻】【集韻】張六切【正韻】之六切，?音竹。【說文】擣也。【詩·豳風】九月築場圃。【周禮·春官】展器陳告備，及果築鬻。【註】果築鬻者，所築鬻以祼也。　又抬也。【書·金縢】凡大木所偃，盡起而築之。【註】築，拾也。【疏】禾爲大木所偃者，起其木，拾下禾，無所亡失。　又【集韻】佇六切。杵有鐏。　又與妯同。【揚子·方言】築妯，匹也。【註】關西兄弟婦相呼爲築娌。

築字的源字形

字源演变：

金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhù］
["Guangyun" Zhang Liuqie, enter the house, know. ]
"Build 2" in traditional characters.
(1) A pestle for pounding soil.
(2) Pound the soil to make it solid.
(3) Build, build.
(4) Rooms; buildings.
(5) Hit, hit.
(6) Packing; filling.
(7) Pick up.
(8) Measure name.
(9) Pass "Wish". Cut off.
(10) Through "妯". See "Building".

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Zhang Liuqie [Zheng Yun] six cuts, sound bamboo. [Said the text] Do it too. 【Poetry·Binfeng】Building a nursery in September. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan】Exhibition equipment report, and fruit construction. [Note] Those who build a temple with fruit will be naked.　 Lift it again. 【Book·Jinyu】Everything made of big wood is built up. 【Note】Build, pick up. 【Sparse】He is the one who has taken the big wood. Pick up the wood and pick up the grass, and there is nothing to lose.　 [Ji Yun] Six cuts. Pestle has a dice.　Same as Huo again. 【Yangtze Dialect】Zhuhua, Piye. [Note] The Kansai brothers and wives call each other as Zhu Lao.

Name meaning

zhù
вм. 筑
Radicals: 竹, 木  (bamboo, tree, saw)
Meaning Mnemonic
You saw down a bamboo tree to construct and build a building. Bamboo trees are great for construction, so you saw down a bunch of bamboo trees to build this new building.
Imagine yourself sawing down this bamboo tree. Feel the saw in your hands as you slide through the bamboo, wood chips flying everywhere.
Reading Mnemonic
As you construct and build this building, you hear a strange cheeping noise. Suddenly a chick (ちく) pops out of one of the bamboo pieces you are building with. Then another, and another. You're surrounded by chicks!
Imagine trying to construct the rest of this building covered in baby chicks. They're very cute, but this is dangerous! You have to build very carefully, so you don't accidentally hurt any of them.
